dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh! Kelly takes Jude aside as Kim and Vicki approach Henri Anne. KIM (CONTINUING; WHISPERS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure she likes Weller? VICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Positive. I heard her say she's had the hots for him since they met! KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She said that? VICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, not exactly. HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Kim. You'll be in the gym promptly at three-fifteen for rehearsal? KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, actually no, Miss Benton. can't make it... You know Mr. Weller? HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're... acquainted. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He.. umm.. VICKI (BLURTS OUT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got a crush on Kim! (CONTINUED)
660 CONTINUED: (2) 66

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim stares in amazement aL Vicki; HENRI --ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (staring at Kim) He has what? Kim, wide-eyed, can only look at Vicki. VICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He keeps making Kim stay after school in detention study hall for no reason... Just so he can be near her. HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's horrible! Kim gulps. HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean to tell me that awful man A girl half his age! (a very slight SMILE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you have detention this afternoon? Kim nods meekly. Lost in thought, Henri-Anne fondles a tennis ball, a curious smile playing across her face. HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUING; FINALLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave everything to me... She hurries away. Kim turns on Vicki and starts to protest. VICKI (INTERRUPTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It worked, didn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim and Vicki, and behind them, Jude and Kelly are walking back to the gym and the dressing rooms from the tennis courts. Vicki's in high spirits and Jude still can't stop giggling. Vicki spots old Sykes heading out toward the playing field. She calls out to him. (CONTINUED)     57- 67 CONTIPRJED 67 VICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Sykes! KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicki, don't... VICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Mr. Sykes... Sykes stops, turns around. VICKI (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is just for you... She turns, bends over, quickly yanks down her shorts and moons him. There's a squeal of laughter from Jude and from Kelly. Vicki whips her shorts back up and runs to the gym door, the other girls in pursuit. Kim looks back at Sykes. He's just standing in the field, not moving. There's a look in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim and Kelly are undressing. Three girls pass them headin g for the showers. KELLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not like the others, Kim. Drew needs somebody like Vicki who'll give him what he wants. KIM (LAUGHS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vicki's sex life is more talk than action. Besides, Drew wants you. KELLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid if I don't make it with him he'll find somebody who will. KIM (SHRUGS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let him. KELLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd die if he did... The girls wrap towels around themselves and walk to- wards the showers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sa .

dialogues.speaker: INTT. SHIER AREA
dialogues.text: A girl (MELANIE) is leaving as Kim and'Kelly enter. Wendy is standing in front of a mirror drying her hair. Kim ignores her and Wendy returns the compliment. MELANIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you outside, Wendy. WENDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just be a minute... Kim and Kelly hang up their towels and step into the showers. KELLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about you and Nick? KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about us? Wendy finishes brushing her hair, shoots Kim.a dark look, exits. KELLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What.happened when he asked you? Kim smiles. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe I asked him... Kelly looks at her friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendy finishes buttoning her blouse. She's pulling on her jeans when she hears a SCUFFLING SOUND. WENDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be right there, Melanie. No answer. Curious, Wendy moves around the lockers, investigating. The room appears empty. There's a sudden LOUD CREAKING. Wendy whirls around. A locker door is swinging slowly open. WENDY (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Melanie?... Still no answer. Shaking her head, Wendy returns to her locker. (CONTINUED)     70 CONTINUED: 70

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's about to shut it when she sees something, a pic- ture, taped to the side of the door. It's her photo, torn from the School Yearbook. She rips it from the door, looks at it. WENDY (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this for, Melanie? Her voice echoes through the empty room. She gazes around, fear creeping into her face. She quickly finishes dressing, grabs her books, turns to leave. Suddenly she screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendy's SCREAM is all but DROWNED OUT by the SHOWERS. Rinsing off, Kim and Kelly hear nothing. KELLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I'll let Drew do it. The door to the locker roor slowly opens behind them. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let him? She looks at Kelly. Neither girl hears the SQUISH of RUBBER SOLES moving across the wet tile floor. Suddenly there are LOUD VOICES. Melanie comes through from the locker room, laughing. Behind her, Wendy's ANGRY WORDS are AUDIBLE.

dialogues.speaker: WENDY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: If you ever try anything like that again, you cow! Melanie thinks it's hilarious. MELANIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Kim and Kelly) You should've seen her jump... Nadia Comenici never did better... Wendy storms in. She's got the photo in her hand. She waves it at Kim and Kelly. WENDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this supposed to mean? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: vv. 71 CONTINUED - 71 KIM (SARCASTIC)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know it's not much of a picture, Wendy, but you didn't have to go that far... Wendy is furious. WENDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't! She turns, glares at Melanie. MELANIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't look at me... WENDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're all... children... She storms out. Melanie looks at Kim and Kelly, shrugs, follows Wendy. A DOOR SLAMS in the locker room. Kim and Kelly look at each other, laugh, turn their faces back to the steaming water. Neither one hears the SOUND across the room, a HARSH RHYTHMIC HEAVY BREATHING. Kelly bends her head away from the water, clears her eyes., She squints out through the steam at the big wall mirror across the room. She sees something. She steps back into Kim, her eyes wide with fear. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch it... Kelly covers her breasts with her arms, presses against the wall, terrified. Suddenly there's an EXPLOSION of SOUND. Kim screams, jumps back, stares. There's a jagged hole in the cen- ter of the mirror, huge cracks radiating from it, spidering across its surface. For a moment no one moves. Splinters of GLASS TRICKLE down to the floor. There's no other sound. Kim grabs for her towel, steps out of the shower, looks. There's no one. She heads for the locker room door. Kelly runs after her. KELLY KIM 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim rushes into the room, Kelly right behind her. There's no one. Kelly is quivering. She clutches at Kim's arm. Kim looks at her. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you see? Kelly just shakes her head. KELLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just... just... a shadow or.,. Kim heads for the exit door across the room. Kelly stays with her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim opens the outside door, peers down the walkway to the tennis courts, playing fields. There's no sign of anyone. She closes the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim turns back.to Kelly who's started to cry. KELLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone was there! Someone was... in there... Kim is taking charge. She moves cautiously back to the shower room door, opens it, looks in. She gasps. KELLY (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? What!s wrong? Kelly's on the edge of hysteria. She runs over to Kim. They both look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the girls see is the mirror. Something has changed. A long wedge of glass has been lifted out o it.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE 76
dialogues.text: Kim shuts the door, presses against it, stares at Kelly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim walks quickly down a long school corridor and turns into her father's office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim enters. Adele Cooper is seated behind the secre- tary's desk thumbing through a fashion magazine. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd like to see my f ather . ADELE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another Hammond? KIM (AGITATED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he here? ADELE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, he's not. He said he'd be back but... She trails off. Kim is obviously upset. ADELE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's urrong? KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... There was... Somebody broke a mirror in the shower room... There was somebody in there... ADELE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mirror? Seven years bad luck... She tries to smile. Kim just looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim turns a corner, heading for class, and almost runs into Sykes, cleaning the floor. Sykes turns. For a moment their eyes lock. Then Kim hurries away, almost running. Sykes stares after her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim comes down the hallway and stops at the door. There's a piece of paper with a hastily scrawled mes- sage taped there. It heads: "Detention Postponed Until Monday -- EMERGENCY! Weller."

dialogues.speaker: VICKI, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Did it work? Kim is startled, turns. Vicki and Jude and approach- ing. Vicki hurries to the door, reads the note. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ai. 80 CONTINUED : 80 VICKI (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It worked! She lets out a whoop, embraces Jude. Kim stands back, somehow less impressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several students are putting last-minute touches on the decor as Kim comes in. Huge speakers are being hoisted on pulleys to hang from the ceiling. A vast, raised platform covers much of the gym floor, its plexiglass surface designed to be illuminated from below. Perched on a ladder, Weller is hanging shimmering silver strips while Henri-Anne Benton supervises from the disco floor. HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Careful, Monty... A little higher... (sees Kim and SMILES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm glad you could make it! KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something came up... (looks at Weller) 'Afternoon, Mr. Weller. WELLER (EMBARRASSED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, hello, Miss... Hammond. I was just... uh... Henri-Anne mercifully interrupts him. HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get started. (CALLS OUT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick! Nick pokes his head out of the sound booth set on a platform near the stage. HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Onstage! Tell Alex we're ready. Alex emerges from the booth. DAVY MATLOCK, a pudgy, fifteen-year-old sophomore and Alex's technical assis- tant, leans out behind him. (CONTINUED)     81 81 CONTINUED: ALEX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All set, Miss Benton. Just have Davy roll the tapes. HENRI -ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wonderful. You can be Mr. Hanunond for the rehearsal! Alex groans. Kim smiles as Nick joins her. She takes his hand, clutches it. They start to walk away, talk- ing quietly. Nick puts his arm around her. HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick! Kim! Come with me. Henri-Anne bounds up onto the stage. Kim and Nick fol- low her behind the curtain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Henri-Anne takes Kim to one of the wings of the dark cluttered area. HENRI -ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll wait here... (looks around for NICK)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick? Nick silently creeps from behind a partition and moves up directly behind Henri-Anne. He mimes choking her, a crazed expression on his face. Kim has to laugh at his clowning. HENRI-ANNE CONTINUING; WHIRLS AROUND)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick! NICK (GRINS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scary place! HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to stand up here tonight, not me. If you don't know what to do, you'll look the fool! Nick glances at Kim. She shrugs. (CONTINUED)     65- 82 CONTINUED: 82 HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUIN G)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come along. Nick follows her to the opposite wing. Kim cannot see them from her position. HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing; calls out) Can you hear me, Kim? KIM CALLS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Kim leans against a wall, gazing around at her gloomy surroundings. She does not hear the WHISPERED CONVER- SATION coming from behind a nearby partition. She does not see Wendy and Lou lurking there, watching her. HENRI-ANNE (SHOUTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, Alex, start the tape. A TRUMPET FANFARE BLARES OUT of the SPEAKERS. HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUING; SHOUTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen for your cue, king and queen... PROFESSIONAL MUSIC is HEARD. HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUING; SHOUTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Start walking -- slowly! Kim begins to cross the stage. She smiles when she spots Nick. The curtain slowly opens. VOICE (TAPED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The King and Queen of the George Winston High School Junion-Senior Prom for 1980 -- Nick McBride and Kim Hammond! They meet backstage center and turn towards the parting curtain. Henri-Anne stands at the front of the stage, her hand resting on Alex's shoulder, as Kim and Nick proceed downstage. (CONTINUED)
82 CONTINUED: (2) 82 VOICE (TAPED) (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These two seniors were selected by their fellow students as the most popular boy and girl in the class.. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Kim as they WALK)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullshit! Kim smiles. Peeking out from behind the curtain, Wendy turns to Lou. WENDY (BITTERLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullshit! LOU (GRINS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh! VOICE (TAPED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick is a three-sport letterman and president of the Key Club. He plans to attend State University in the fall. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because he can't get in anywhere else! VOICE (TAPED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim is the head cheerleader and ranked number one on the girls' tennis team. She hopes to become a teacher. NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If she ever graduates... Nick and Kim stop downstage center. HENRI-ANNE (SHOVING ALEX FORWARD)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, Alex. Self-consciously, Alex stumbles up to Kim and pretends to give her a bouquet of roses. (CONTINUED)
82 CONTINUED: (3) 82 HENRI -ANNE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it, Alex. Now kiss her! ALEX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My sister? HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alex! Alex awkwardly kisses Kim on the cheek. HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now the king. ALEX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kiss the king? NICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the mouth! Kim laughs at Alex's discomfort. HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shake hands... They shake. HENRI -ANNE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alex, step back... Alex moves next to her. HENRI -ANNE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim and Nick, start down the.. (looks at the STAGE APRON)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are the steps? Silence. HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing; to the ENTIRE GYM)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You expect our king and queen to jump to the floor? A STUDENT in the back timidly responds. (CONTINUED)
82 CONTINUED: (4) 82 STUDENT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll find them, Miss Benton. Henri-Anne turns back to Nick and Kim. HENRI-ANNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll descend the steps... Nick and Kim climb down from the stage. HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick, give Kim your arm... (as he does) Move to the center of the floor. Nick and Kim self-consciously cross the room, aware that everyone is watching them. HENRI-ANNE (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait for the spotlights and your music cue, then dance... (SIGHS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll be beautiful!

dialogues.speaker: TNT. HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Kim strides down the empty corridor, flushed and ex- cited from the rehearsal. Arriving at her father's of- fice, she flings open the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim enters and surveys the apparently empty office. Hearing GRUNTS and GROANS from behind the desk, Kim steps around and sees Adele Cooper stretched across the floor. The secretary is practicing her "Rainbow" exer- cise, arching her body towards the ceiling while keep- ing her hands and feet on the floor. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello? Adele twists her head around to look at Kim. Her "Rainbow" collapses. Spinning around, Adele sits cross-legged on the floor and smiles at Kim. ADELE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay? KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... I've calmed down a bit... (CONTINUED)
84 CONTINUED: 84

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adele launches into another contortion. ADELE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This works for me. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has my father been back? ADELE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope. Haven't seen him all afternoon. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he didn't leave a message? ADELE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a word. KIM (PUZZLED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strange... He usually gives me a ride home. ADELE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me finish and I'll give you a lift. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, but I can walk. Kim starts to leave, turning around at the door. KIM (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess I won't be seeing you again. Standing on her head, Adele smiles. ADELE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess again. Three different students asked me to the prom tonight... I thought you had to be enrolled! KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going? ADELE (NODS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not with any of them. Know any good-looking fathers? CONTINUED)
84 CONTINUED: (2) 84 KIM (SMILES) -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll keep my eyes open. See you later. She exits as Adele slowly lowers her legs to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jude approaches her locker, stops. There's a picture taped to her locker door, her picture, ripped out of the Winston High Yearbook. She looks at it, reaches up and pulls it off the door. She winces, looks at her finger. It's bleeding. She looks at the picture. There's a tiny sliver of glass embedded in it. Jude hears SOMEONE COMING. She turns to see Kelly com- ing toward her. KELLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jude... look... She has something in her hand. It's a photo of her, a, Yearbook photo with the same torn edges. Jude holds up her version. KELLY (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DOOR CREAKS open. A light is flicked on. Sykes stands there, a broom and a big waste-pan in his hands. He stares at the broken mirror with its center hole and its missing wedge. He shuffles across the floor and starts to clean up the debris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The split-level suburban residence sits on a tree-lined street in an older, middle-class neighborhood. Walking up the driveway, Kim hears a LOUD THUD from behind the house. As the SOUND CONTINUES, Kim walks around back to investigate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stepping around the corner of the house, Kim sees her father furiously chopping an old stump in the flower garden. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: / l. 88 CONTINUED: 88

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hammond's axe slashes into the rotten wood, sending splinters flying in all directions. Kim watches him work. He appears angry and upset. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi. Oblivious, Hammond buries the axe in the stump. Kim moves around to face him. When he sees her, Hammond jumps, startled. HAMMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't hear you. KIM (SMILES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry. Wiping the sweat from his forehead, Hammond struggles to catch his breath. HAMMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm getting too old for this. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you doing it now? HAMMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your mother's been hounding me to get it done... You got nay message? KIM (PUZZLED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. HAMMOND (ANGRILY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told that woman to tell you I had a meeting and couldn't drive you home. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your secretary? HAMMOND (NODS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Idiot! KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I liked her. Hammond angrily jerks the axe from the stump. (CONTINUED)
88 CONTINUED: 2) 88 KIM (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay? HA` ONND (SHRUGS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This thing with your mother... Have you seen her yet? KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. How is she? HAMMOND (SIGHS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One minute she's depressed, the next she's bubbling over like a child... She wants to go with me tonight. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great! HAMMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not so sure. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think getting dressed up and going out might be good for her.

dialogues.speaker: HA",24OND
dialogues.text: She's had a bad day, Kim. I'm not sure she can handle it... See if you can talk to her. Hammond picks up the axe and sends it crashing into the stump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim enters from the backyard. Looking around, she no- tices that nothing is being prepared for dinner. Curious, she moves toward the living room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vivian is arranging fresh roses on the mantel shrine when Kim enters. The girl stands for several seconds watching her mother before she speaks. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, Mom. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: /,5 90 CONTINUED: 90 VIVIAN (WITHOUT TURNING AROUND)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Robin. Don't eat anything. Dinner's almost ready. Disturbed, Kim frowns and slowly crosses the room to her mother. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing's cooking, Mom. You must've forgotten. Slipping out of her reverie, Vivian turns around to face Kim. VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.. I don't know what I was thinking. KIM (SMILES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter. VIVIAN (EXCITEDLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you seen the new satin pantsuit I'm wearing? Vivian smiles at her daughter. Kim studies her for a long moment, then leans over and kisses her on the cheek. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Kim walks down the hallway, she notices that Alex's door is closed. She enters her bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim crosses the room and switches ON her RADIO. ROCK MUSIC is HEARD as she tosses her books onto the desk and moves to the closet. She carefully pulls out her prom dress, a mid-length, off-the-shoulder gown in a white, clinging material. Holding it up against her body, she inspects the gown in the full-length mirror on the closet door. Watching her reflection, Kim twirls around, hugging the gowm to her body. Satis- fied, she gently lays the go%.m on her bed. (CONTINUED)     92 CONTINUED: 92

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim begins to undress. Outside, the twilight shadows deepen. THROUGH the VINDOM, a slight movement is SEAN among the trees; suddenly, a dark figure becomes VISIBLE, ap- proaching.the window. Kim does not notice the figure as she finishes undressing. She wraps herself in a robe and sits at her dressing table. Putting her hair up, she does not see the shadowy figure peering inside. When Kim stands up, the figure slips away from the window. As she crosses the room, the face reappears, hidden by the shadows, watching her enter the bathroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wearing only a bra and panties, Wendy is sprawled across her bed, talking on the telephone. A black silk gown is draped across her legs. WENDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into the receiver) What I'm wearing now?... Oh, tonight! (smiles, gently stroking the gown) You'll find out soon enough. (STIFFENS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, are we all set?... It better. I don't want her to ever forget tonight!... Okay, 'bye. Wendy hangs up the receiver and glances at her night table. A photograph of a grinning Nick McBride stares back. Wendy smiles and caresses her gown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seated at her dressing table, Kim puts the final touch- es on her makeup. Her hair is swept up and back, fall- ing in soft waves to her shoulders. Wearing the rav- ishing white gown, she looks older and very beautiful. Vivian's VOICE is HEARD from down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIAN, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Kim! Vivian comes in looking anxious and flustered. She's dressed in an elegant black satin pantsuit. Kim turns, looks at her. (CONTINUED)
94 CONTINUED: 94 KI`RF

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom, it looks great... Vivian doesn't seem to hear her. She's rummaging through her purse. VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim, have you got any of my makeup? KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... I never... VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That deep red lipstick, you remember? You liked it... KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't take it without asking you... Vivian's very wound up. VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was on my dressing table, I set it aside... She's looking around Kim's room as if she expects to see it. VIVIAN (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why does this always happen at the last minute? Hammond's VOICE bellows from downstairs.

dialogues.speaker: HAMMOND, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: let's go, we can't be late... VIVIAN (TO KIM)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I set it aside... She heads for the door, stops, looks fully at Kim for the first time. VIVIAN (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look lovely, dear. She goes out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hammond stands in front of a hall mirror, straightening his bow tie. He seems agitated, nervous. He turns as Vivian starts down the stairs. He looks surprised at her outfit. There's a certain similarity between it and his own formal suit. HAMIM0ND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My God, we're going to look like twins. Vivian stops dead, looks at him. Hammond forces a smile. HAMMOND (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm joking, Vi, it's beautiful.._ C'mon... She hesitates, then comes down to him. VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you I'd bought it. HAMMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you did. He opens the door for her. She pauses to check herself in the mirror. HAMMOND (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: we've got to go. He puts an arm around her, kisses her gently on the cheek. She just stares at herself in the mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hammond takes Vivian's arm as they step outside, walk toward the car in the driveway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone is watching Hammond and Vivian from a car parked across and just down the street. A shadow moves in the foreground, in the front seat of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hammond guides his wife to their family car, opens the passenger door for her_ He looks past her, down the street, sees a car parked there. (CONTINUED)     I I 98 CONTINUED: 98

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A streetlight reflecting off its windshield prevents him from seeing inside. Vivian interrupts his speculations. VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going back to change. She turns back to the house. Hammond holds on to her arm. HAMMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vi... there's no time... VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going to look ridiculous! IAMMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't look ridiculous, you look fine...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The figure in the front seat watches the confrontation in the Hammond driveway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hammond takes Vivian by the shoulders, faces her. HAMMON D

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vi.. this is a big night for the school, it's a big night for me... I know how you're feeling... I understand... It's difficult for all of us... But we've got to make a special effort, Vi... We can't let the... terrible memories of this day affect us... That may seem cold and... insensitive to you, but it's the way it has to be.. He pauses, staring down at his wife. She's holding his gaze. HAMMOND (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, Vi, if you think it's going to be too difficult for you... VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't want me to go. (CONTINUED)
100 CONTINUED: 100 HAMMOND T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Certainly I want you to go, just saying... VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't think I can do it... You think I'll embarrass you... HARMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! I don't... believe me.. VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why are you saying these things? HAMMMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vi... I just.. He's trying to stay calm, to keep the lid on. She's on the verge of tears. HAMMOND (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry... I didn't mean to upset you... VIVIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You treat me like a child! I'm your wife! She glares at him. He releases her from his grip, ges- tures toward the car. HANMOND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get going... He walks around to the driver's door. Vivian stares after him with hard cold eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The figure in the parked car watches as Hammond starts up the car, waits for Vivian to get in, backs out of the driveway, and moves off down the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The figure climbs out of his car, gazes at the fading taillights of the Hammond car. The figure is Nick McBride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim reaches for a small bottle of cologne. (CONTINUED)
103 CONTINUED: 103

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she gently tracks the perf me across her skin, she is startled by another reflection in her mirror. Whirling around, she sees Alex. Standing up, she pir- ouettes and curtsies before her brother. KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well? Alex gapes, stunned by his sister's appearance. ALEX (FINALLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amazing! KIM (SMILES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You like? ALEX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look almost like a woman! KIM (LAUGHS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks! She picks up her corsage from her dressing table. KIM (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to help or just leer? ALEX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're my sister... I'll leer! KIM (LAUGHS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pin this on me, you creep, late. Alex takes the corsage. As he attaches the bright red flower on her gown, she playfully dabs perfume on his neck. He pulls back, pricking himself on the pin. ALEX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! KIM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You shouldn't have pulled away... The DOORBELL RINGS. KIM (CONTINUING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's him! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ALE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: er's face is revealed. It is the nine-year-old Alex. Kim cradles the killer on the ground. She turns his head toward the light. We SEE his face full-on. VIVIA N

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robin! She rushes forward, lunging for the body. Hammond grabs her, restraining her. Alex's dark eyes stare back unseeing at his family. His resemblance to his dead twin sister is uncanny. His hair falls onto his forehead in bangs, as Robin's had done seven years before. His makeup has been slop- pily applied. The rouged cheeks and the smudged red lips amplify the grotesque impersonation. Kim strokes her brother's hair. Hammond presses his hysterical wife to him. The onlookers slowly close in. We SLOWLY DISSOLVE FROM Alex's face TO a photograph of the Hammond family taken seven years earlier. We MOVE IN CLOSE ON the twins. Alex and Robin are smiling. FADE OUT. THE END
